sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { StyleSheet, View, Image, Linking } from 'react-native'; import { useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native'; import { Panel, AppBar, Button, List, Text, ScrollView, Divider, Window, Anchor, useTheme, } from 'react95-native'; import type { Theme } from 'react95-native'; import GenericLogo from './assets/images/gcp.png'; import GenericSizzle from "./genericday.mp4"; import GenericPoster from "./play.jpg"; type Props = { setTheme: (theme: Theme) => void; }; const ExamplesScreen = ({ setTheme: setThemeProp }: Props) => { const [showAboutModal, setShowAboutModal] = useState(false); const navigation = useNavigation(); // const { theme: currentTheme, setTheme } = useContext(LocalThemeContext); const currentTheme = useTheme(); const openLink = (url: string) => { Linking.openURL(url).catch(err => console.warn("Couldn't load page", err)); }; return ( {showAboutModal ? ( setShowAboutModal(false)} > Team

James Smith - Generic CEO
Lord Johnson - Developer
caribou - UI / UX
Charlie Doodle - Designer


Contact

genericcoin@outlook.com
twitter.com/TheGenericCoin
t.me/genericcoin

{/* This PRERELEASE{' '} version of React95 Native is under construction! {'\n'} {'\n'} Please remember that the components, themes and API will continue to change through the product's development cycle. {'\n'} {'\n'} If you find this project interesting consider doing the following: {'\n'} {'\n'}- follow our{' '} openLink('https://twitter.com/react95_io')} > Twitter account {'\n'}- visit our{' '} openLink('https://react95.io/')} > Website {'\n'}- sponsor us on{' '} openLink('https://www.patreon.com/arturbien') } > Patreon {'\n'}- donate through{' '} openLink('https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/react95') } > PayPal {'\n'}- tell your friends! {'\n'} {'\n'} Thanks! {'\n'} {'\n'}- the React95 team */} ) : ( <> Generic Coin {/* {themes.map(theme => ( setThemeProp(theme)} key={theme.name} /> ))} */}
openLink('https://apeswap.finance/swap/?outputCurrency=0x98a61CA1504b92Ae768eF20b85aa97030b7a1Edf')} >

openLink('https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x98a61CA1504b92Ae768eF20b85aa97030b7a1Edf')} >


0x98a61ca1504b92ae768ef20b85aa97030b7a1edf {/*
Buy Sell
1% Team/Marketing Tax 1% Team/Marketing Tax
4% Locked LP Tax
1,000,000,000,000 Total Supply
39.3% of the Total Supply for Presale
50% of Total Supply for Liquidity (100% Locked for 1 Year)
15% of Total Supply for Private Sale to Raise BUSD to be used for Buyback and Burns to Correct Dumps
0.7% of Total Supply for Apeswap's IAO Listing Fee
*/}

Generic LP Farming

Generic PCS LP completed

Generic Website Expansion 1 completed

Generic Website Expansion 2

Generic Website Expansion 3

Generic Launchpad

Generic Game

Generic Ad Campaign

ApeSwap

Partyhat - t.me/partyhat

genericcoin@outlook.com

twitter.com/TheGenericCoin

t.me/genericcoin

{/* genericcoin@outlook.com */} openLink('mailto:genericcoin@outlook.com')} > genericcoin@outlook.com )} ); }; const styles = StyleSheet.create({ container: { maxWidth: '70rem', width: '100%', margin: 'auto', flex: 1, }, textIndent: { paddingLeft: 16, }, listItem: { height: 40, paddingHorizontal: 18, }, panel: { flex: 1, padding: 8, marginTop: -4, paddingTop: 12, }, cutout: { flexGrow: 1, marginTop: 8, }, content: { padding: 16, }, scrollView: { flex: 1, }, section: { marginBottom: 16, }, statusBar: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', width: '100%', marginTop: 4, }, statusBarItem: { paddingHorizontal: 6, height: 32, justifyContent: 'center', }, header: { justifyContent: 'center', marginBottom: -4, zIndex: 10, }, logo: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', top: 2, }, logoImage: { position: 'absolute', left: -38, top: -4, height: 32, width: 32, resizeMode: 'cover', }, heading: { fontSize: 24, fontStyle: 'italic', }, aboutButton: { position: 'absolute', right: 8, height: 40, width: 40, }, questionMark: { width: 26, height: 26, }, scrollPanel: { zIndex: -1, }, video: { margin: '2rem 0', }, }); export default ExamplesScreen;
